characters.name: Sunny
characters.description: The main protagonist. An orphan from the outskirts who awakens as a Sleeper.

characters.name: Nephis
characters.description: A brilliant and powerful Awakened from a noble lineage. Has a burning inner light.

characters.name: Cassie
characters.description: A blind girl with prophetic visions. Gentle and kind despite her disability.

characters.name: Kai
characters.description: A charming young man with a mysterious past and hidden depths.

characters.name: Effie
characters.description: A lazy but incredibly talented Legacy. Loves food and sleeping.

characters.name: Caster
characters.description: An arrogant Legacy from a powerful clan. Initially antagonistic.

characters.name: Shadow
characters.description: Sunny's shadow, which has its own mysterious sentience and personality.

characters.name: Mordret
characters.description: A mysterious and dangerous figure with terrifying powers.

characters.name: Jet
characters.description: Leader of the Irregulars hunting cohort. Stern but fair.

characters.name: Teacher Julius
characters.description: The instructor at the Awakened Academy who teaches combat.

characters.name: Rain
characters.description: Sunny's younger sister who he cares for deeply.

characters.name: Saint
characters.description: A mysterious stone echo that becomes one of Sunny's most powerful shadows.

characters.name: Nightmare
characters.description: A terrifying steed-type creature that Sunny bonds with.

characters.name: Serpent
characters.description: A massive serpentine shadow with water-related abilities.

characters.name: Morgan
characters.description: A powerful female warrior and member of the Valor clan.

characters.name: Master Jet
characters.description: Becomes Sunny's master and mentor in the real world.

characters.name: Anvil
characters.description: A massive, powerful Awakened who works with Jet.

characters.name: Fiend
characters.description: A powerful shadow with regenerative abilities.

characters.name: Ananke
characters.description: An ancient and powerful being connected to fate itself.

characters.name: Hope
characters.description: A mysterious creature with connections to dreams.

terms.name: Nightmare Spell
terms.description: The mysterious force that brought the Nightmare Creatures to Earth.

terms.name: Awakened
terms.description: Humans who survived their First Nightmare and gained supernatural powers.

terms.name: Sleeper
terms.description: A person marked by the Spell who will soon face their First Nightmare.

terms.name: First Nightmare
terms.description: The trial every Sleeper must face to become Awakened or die trying.

terms.name: Aspect
terms.description: The unique power granted to an Awakened after surviving their First Nightmare.

terms.name: Flaw
terms.description: A weakness or curse that accompanies an Awakened's Aspect.

terms.name: Soul Core
terms.description: The source of an Awakened's power, grows stronger with experience.

terms.name: Memory
terms.description: Magical items that Awakened can store in their soul and summon at will.

terms.name: Echo
terms.description: Soul remnants of defeated Nightmare Creatures that can be bound.

terms.name: Legacy
terms.description: Children of Awakened who inherit a portion of their parents' power.

terms.name: Dream Realm
terms.description: The mysterious dimension where Nightmare Creatures originate.

terms.name: Seed of Nightmare
terms.description: Cores from powerful Nightmare Creatures used for ascending.

terms.name: Ascension
terms.description: The process of advancing to a higher rank of power.

terms.name: Saint
terms.description: The highest rank of Awakened, immensely powerful beings.

terms.name: Great Clans
terms.description: Powerful families that control much of human society: Valor, Song, others.

terms.name: Irregulars
terms.description: Government hunting cohort that operates outside the Great Clans.

terms.name: Shadow Dance
terms.description: Sunny's special movement technique using shadows.

terms.name: Soul Sea
terms.description: The internal space where an Awakened stores their power and shadows.
